definitions.definition: In a clinical manner: dispassionately or analytically .
In the setting of a medical clinic ; in a clinical setting; ( of a health condition ) to a degree high enough to be relevant to clinical practice.
examples: Hypokalemia may manifest clinically as fatigue and muscle cramping.
Mild electrolyte disturbances are usually not clinically apparent, but if they worsen, symptoms begin.

main_definition: In a clinical manner: dispassionately or analytically .
secondary_definitions: In the setting of a medical clinic ; in a clinical setting; ( of a health condition ) to a degree high enough to be relevant to clinical practice.
